alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 5:05AM MST until January 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible with as much as 22 inches for higher elevations. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel Sunday. Additional hazardous conditions are likely to linger into Monday. Snow forecast from 5 AM Sunday to 5 PM Monday: Alpine 9 to 13 inches Pinetop-Lkside 9 to 13 inches Show Low 5 to 9 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
